duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining relationships with departmental and technical decision makers in assigned accounts.
Differentiating and conveying compelling value propositions for product offerings.
Forecasting and tracking orders and sales within the sales funnel tools.
Creating territory and account plans, building strong business relationships, and responding to key account decision makers' needs.
Maintaining up-to-date detailed knowledge of product offerings and market trends.
Identifying and creating new opportunities, driving tender/bid process, and contributing to account plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or 5 years of sales experience in the healthcare industry.
